title: BOUND 2
lyrics:
[Intro]
We don't fall in love
(B-B-B-B-Bound to fall in love)
Haha, shut up Doja, you stupid
(Bound to fall in love)
Uh-huh, honey
[Verse]
Dudes be 21 lookin' 19 actin' young (Uh-huh)
Chicks be 14 lookin' 18 actin' drunk (Yeah, huh)
I fuckin' flunked, exaggerated (Flunked, flunked)
Learned more on the web, 
Uh-huh, honey
 coulda graduated (Woo)
You didn't want none of my friendship but I'm glad you made it (I liked it)
And I'm glad you hated (Hated)
And I'm glad you faded (Huh)
Cuz if we thought alike, you wouldn't extract the payment
Aww man, I'm sayin' stop playin' mane
Maybe you'd extract the payment
"Doja a crazy bitch (Crazy bitch)
You a psychopath" (Psychopath)
At least I never fire back I go and write a rap (Write a rap)
Cuz we ain't got time (Time)
For ya tired crap (Crap)
Roshod, Kyle, Jerry, Dave, and all my fans (Woo)
We ain't puttin' shine on ya tired crap
Said, we ain't puttin' shine on ya tired crap
We left it all behind, we don't desire cash (Uh-huh)
We don't admire that (Ooh, uh-huh)
Bag a bitch like designer bags (Oh, shit)
You ain't the one type of nigga for a ten
You soft as no dick, by: Ken
Tryna holla back like a bitch, hah, I heard you sayin' Byron

[Chorus]
Falling in love
See, we don't fall in love (Hahaha), nigga, we don't fall in love
Uh-uh, falling in love
We don't fall in love, nigga, we don't fall in love
No-n-n-n-oh-oh-uh-uh-oh-uh-uh-uh-oh
We don't fall in love, nigga, we don't fall in love
No, we, yeah, no we don't, no, no, we don't
[Outro]
Uh-huh, honey
Hold up, hold up, bitch
Hahaha
